title: Report of the Chief of Police of Morton County Kyle Kerschmeyer on Twitter
subtitle: A sarcastic Twitter account attributed to the Mayor of Morton Kyle Kershmeyer County contains a number of ironic (and hideous) tweetings about the Dakota Access Pipeline protests.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The Mayor of Morton County, Kyle Kerschmeyer, published on Twitter a pro-Dakota entry point and anti-American content.
